channel.title: Ucosp Impressions on UCOSP
channel.description: Recent content in Ucosp Impressions on UCOSP

item.title: Why Nikita wishes UofT made courses like UCOSP mandatory.
item.description: “Do not waste time being jealous: sometimes you’re ahead, sometimes behind. Race is long and in the end you see that you are only competing with yourself”. __ The reason I switched from Mechanical Engineering to Computer Science after my first undergrad year, to be short: it was extremely boring. I did not want to wait for the 3rd year to come in orderÂ for the stuff to get more interesting.
